Ena 14xrono koritsi, h Grace (Scarlett Johansson) kai o Pilgrim, to agaphmeno ths alogo, travmatizontai sovara se ena troxaio atyxhma. H mhtera ths Annie (Kristin Scott Thomas), mia polyasxolh syntaktria apo to Manhatan, pliroforeitai gia thn 
yparxh tou "Gitefti" Tom Booker (Robert Redford).

O gerasmenos cowboy gnorizei pos na epikoinonei kai na therapevei ta aloga, eno zei makrya apo tis koinonikes symvaseis, dexetai na voithisei ton Pilgrim ki etsi mesa sto yperoxo fysiko topio ths Montana, arxizei mia makra periodos gia th therapeia ths psyxhs oxi mono toy alogou kai ths mikrhs  tou idiokthtrias, alla kai ths Annie kai tou idiou tou Tom.

Ã‚Â«O Giteftis ton alogonÃ‚Â» einai mia tryferh, vathia anthropinh kai romantikh istoria agaphs, me th fysh na protagonistei, toso mesa apo thn exairetikh fotografia, oso kai sthn ousia ths ypotheshs ths tainias.
